title: Draft Do Monsters Have Birthdays?
description: Come along on an epic adventure of a lifetime when a curious little girls' mother tells her that she gets one more question before she has to go to bed. The little girl asks her do monsters have birthdays? Mom is too sleepy to answer and puts the little girl to bed. Before the little girl falls asleep a silly monster comes from under her bed and takes her on an unforgettable journey answering all of her questions in a way she could never imagine! From the mind of Amazon.com bestselling author Jasmine Williams author of the Amazon.com bestselling book -Mama Said NO!- comes a heartwarming tale of unexpected friendship and discovery filled with actual scientific facts sure to delight the child in all of us.
author: Jasmine       Williams
